sentences.en: A fireman has a dangerous way of life.
sentences.cn: 消防队员的谋生方式很危险.

sentences.en: Fireman battled through the smoke in a doomed attempt to rescue the children.
sentences.cn: 消防队员奋力穿过烟雾企图去救孩子们，而这注定是要失败的。

sentences.en: He tried to get the attention of a passing fireman.
sentences.cn: 他企图叫住一位从他身旁经过的消防队员.

sentences.en: That man is a volunteer fireman in this town.
sentences.cn: 那个人是这个镇里的志愿消防队员.

sentences.en: The fire was put out at the cost of a fireman's life.
sentences.cn: 这场火灾是以一位消防队员生命的代价才扑灭的.

sentences.en: The fireman demonstrated great courage in saving the child.
sentences.cn: 那位消防队员在抢救孩子的过程中,表现了极大的勇气.

sentences.en: The fireman evacuated the guests from the burning hotel.
sentences.cn: 消防队员把客人们从燃烧着的旅馆中撤出来.

sentences.en: The fireman flung the burning chair out of the window.
sentences.cn: 消防队员把着火的椅子拽出窗外.

sentences.en: The fireman played the hose onto the burning house.
sentences.cn: 消防人员用消防水龙对着燃烧的房子喷射.

sentences.en: The fireman sent jets of water into the burning house.
sentences.cn: 消防队员把水流喷进燃烧着的房屋.

sentences.en: The fireman smashed the door down to reach the children.
sentences.cn: 消防员破门而入冲向孩子们.

sentences.en: The fireman told me to keep back.
The fireman trained their hoses on the burning building.
sentences.cn: 消防队员把水龙带对准燃烧的建筑物.

sentences.en: The mayor applauded the fireman's bravery in his speech.
sentences.cn: 市长在讲话中称赞了消防队员的勇敢行为.

sentences.en: The smoke had inflamed the fireman's eyes.
sentences.cn: 烟把消防队员的眼睛熏红了.

sentences.en: When people asked me what I wanted to be when I grew up, I never said fireman or astronaut.
sentences.cn: 每当有人来问我长大了要做什麽，我从来不会说消防员或是宇航员什麽的。

sentences.en: Why would you like to be a fireman?
sentences.cn: 为什么你愿意是一名消防队员？

sentences.en: Would you like to be a fireman?
sentences.cn: 你愿意是一名消防队员吗？

trans.tran_en: a man whose job is to stop fires burning
